name: Into The Maze
description:
You are thrust into the labyrinth, a prison for a terrible Cretan warrior who gives all he meets a grizzly end, with only a ball of string and your wits. Avoid the Minotaur and find your way to the exit, child.

You will need to duck and weave, squeeze through cracks and remember your trail. This is a challenge for the willful.

May your feet have speed and cunning. You will need it.

Made for #procjam 2015

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Left Mouse Button - Leave string

Space - Open gates and leave the maze
